calendar-event-select-committee.subject: London's population and the 2011 Census
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Glen Watson, Census Director, Guy Goodwin, Director of Population, Health and Regional Analysis, Office for National Statistics, and Barry Quirk, Chief Executive, London Borough of Lewisham

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Prospects for South West economy
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: South West Regional Development Agency, and South West Councils; Rt Hon Jim Knight MP, Minister for the South West (at 4.00pm)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Financial institutions - Too important to fail?
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Gerald Corrigan, Chairman, Goldman Sachs Bank USA; Douglas Flint, Group Finance Officer, HSBC (at 5.15pm)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: HM Revenue and Customs: Dealing with telephone enquiries
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Lesley Strathie, Permanent Secretary and Chief Executive, Nick Lodge, Director, Debt Management and Banking, and Chris Hopson, Director, Customer Contact, HM Revenue and Customs
